_description: VS Code settings for Cline Extension using Azure AI Foundry through APIM
_instructions: 1. Replace 'your-apim-gateway.azure-api.net' with your actual APIM gateway URL
2. Replace 'your-subscription-key' with your APIM subscription key
3. Update the model name if needed (gpt-4o, gpt-35-turbo, etc.)
4. Add these settings to your VS Code settings.json file
